title: InterContinental Adds Double Points to Summer Stay Bonus
text:
Home > Hotel Deals > InterContinental Adds Double Points to Summer Stay Bonus InterContinental Adds Double Points to Summer Stay Bonus by Tim Winship - July 17, 2015 at 4:12 PM Tweet 
When InterContinental announced details of its "Share Forever" promotion , in effect through September 7, responses from travelers ran the gamut, from "Meh!" to "Yeah!" 
That's because the offers were personalized, varying among IHG Rewards members according to their stay histories and other variables known only to IHG's marketing brain trust. By completing various stay requirements, members were offered between 68,500 and 115,500 bonus points for their own accounts, plus up to 58,500 bonus points to share, or to keep for themselves. 
It was complicated, and in many cases not very compelling. 
Apparently recognizing that the promotion wasn't resonating with consumers, IHG this week augmented it with an additional bonus: double base points , for stays completed between July 15 and September 15. 
So for the next three weeks, IHG Rewards members can earn the original "Share Forever" bonus—which amounted to double points for many members—plus the newly-added double-point bonus. While neither offer alone may be a game-changer, the combination makes for one of the summer's most generous hotel promotions. 
Registration is required.
